TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MissingValueIndicatorEstimator extends Microsoft.ML.Data.TrivialEstimator`1<class Microsoft.ML.Transforms.MissingValueIndicatorTransformer>
Public NotInheritable Class MissingValueIndicatorEstimator Inherits TrivialEstimator(Of MissingValueIndicatorTransformer)

remarks.format:
### Estimator Characteristics | | | | -- | -- | | Does this estimator need to look at the data to train its parameters? | No | | Input column data type | Vector or scalar value of <xref:System.Single> or <xref:System.Double> | | Output column data type | If input column was scalar then <xref:System.Boolean> otherwise vector of <xref:System.Boolean>. |
The resulting <xref:Microsoft.ML.Transforms.MissingValueIndicatorTransformer> creates a new column, named as specified in the output column name parameters, and fills it with vector of bools where `true` in the i-th position in array indicates the i-th element in input column has missing value and `false` otherwise. Check the See Also section for links of examples of the usage.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape GetOutputSchema(class Microsoft.ML.SchemaShape inputSchema) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetOutputSchema (inputSchema As SchemaShape) As SchemaShape

Docs.summary: Returns the of the schema which will be produced by the transformer. Used for schema propagation and verification in a pipeline.
